item.description:
Let's meetup for dinner or cocktails at the Stetson Experience show at the Ashworth by The Sea. Show only $25-Buffet Dinner with show $49.

Internationally known mentalist Jon Stetson delivers a unique brand of psychic entertainment with his distinctive style of humor, intensity, and compassion. This brand new, fun-filled experience, where audience members will live, love, laugh, and learn!

 

Jon's charismatic and lively demonstrations provide his audiences a rare opportunity to experience the fascinating phenomenon of an intuitive experience. The audience is empowered to understand and further develop their psychic skills during a diverting and thought-provoking evening. Everyone in the audience participates and will indeed, amaze themselves and discover their unlimited potential-no one in the room remains a spectator.

He's performed at the White House and on the A&E network, and is also a consultant for the CBS series The Mentalist.
item.how_to_find_us: Meetup badges will be supplied to all meetup members
item.name: The Stetson Experience- An evening with mentalist Jon Stetson
